    public class TigerDomain.TigerObservations
extends ObservationFunction
    Defines the Tiger domain observation function

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canEnumerateObservations()
      Returns whether this object can enumerate observations and implements the ObservationFunction.getAllPossibleObservations() and ObservationFunction.getObservationProbability(burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.singleagent.GroundedAction) methods.
      java.util.List<State> getAllPossibleObservations()
      Returns a List containing all possible observations.
      java.util.List<ObservationFunction.ObservationProbability> getObservationProbabilities(State state, GroundedAction action)
      Returns the observation probability mass/density function for all observations that have non-zero mass/density conditioned on the true MDP state and previous action taken that led to the state.
      double getObservationProbability(State observation, State state, GroundedAction action)
      Returns the probability that an observation will be observed conditioned on the MDP state and previous action taken that led to the state.
      protected State observationLeft()
      Returns the observation of hearing the tiger behind the left door
      protected State observationNothing()
      Returns the observation of hearing nothing; occurs when the do nothing action is selected
      protected State observationReset()
      Returns the observation of approaching a new pair of doors
      protected State observationRight()
      Returns the observation of hearing the tiger behind the right door
      State sampleObservation(State state, GroundedAction action)
      Samples an observation given the true MDP state and action taken in the previous step that led to the MDP state.

        public boolean canEnumerateObservations()
        Description copied from class: ObservationFunction
        Returns whether this object can enumerate observations and implements the ObservationFunction.getAllPossibleObservations() and ObservationFunction.getObservationProbability(burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.singleagent.GroundedAction) methods.
        Specified by:
        canEnumerateObservations in class ObservationFunction
        Returns:

      • getAllPossibleObservations

        public java.util.List<State> getAllPossibleObservations()
        Description copied from class: ObservationFunction
        Returns a List containing all possible observations. Observations are represented with a class that implements the State interface, since observations may consist of multiple observations of distinct objects in the world.
        Specified by:
        getAllPossibleObservations in class ObservationFunction
        Returns:
        a List of all possible observations.

      • getObservationProbability

        public double getObservationProbability(State observation,
                                        State state,
                                        GroundedAction action)
        Description copied from class: ObservationFunction
        Returns the probability that an observation will be observed conditioned on the MDP state and previous action taken that led to the state.
        Specified by:
        getObservationProbability in class ObservationFunction
        Parameters:
        observation - the observation, represented by a State
        state - The true MDP state that generated the observation.
        action - the action that led to the MDP state and which generated the observation
        Returns:
        the probability of observing the observation.

      • getObservationProbabilities

        public java.util.List<ObservationFunction.ObservationProbability> getObservationProbabilities(State state,
                                                                                              GroundedAction action)
        Description copied from class: ObservationFunction
        Returns the observation probability mass/density function for all observations that have non-zero mass/density conditioned on the true MDP state and previous action taken that led to the state. The function is represented as a List of ObservationFunction.ObservationProbability objects, which is a pair of an observation (represented by a State and double specifying its mass/density.
        Specified by:
        getObservationProbabilities in class ObservationFunction
        Parameters:
        state - the true MDP state that generated the observations
        action - the action that led to the MDP state and which generated the observations.
        Returns:
        the observation probability mass/density function represented by a List of ObservationFunction.ObservationProbability objects.
